text: A puppy has 3 bones and gets 2 more. How many bones does it have?
2 kittens are playing, and 4 more join. How many kittens are there?
A bird finds 5 seeds and eats 1. How many seeds are left?
A squirrel collects 6 nuts and drops 2. How many nuts does it keep?
A turtle sees 7 fish and then sees 2 more. How many fish does it see?
An astronaut counts 4 stars and then spots 3 more. How many stars are there?
A rocket has 8 buttons. The engineer adds 1 more. How many buttons now?
A robot on Mars finds 6 rocks but loses 1. How many rocks remain?
A space rover collects 2 samples and later collects 5 more. How many samples total?
The moon has 9 craters but 3 are hidden. How many are still visible?
A child scores 3 goals in soccer and then scores 2 more. How many goals total?
A basketball team has 5 balls and buys 3 more. How many balls do they have?
A baseball player hits 7 balls but misses 2. How many hits does he have?
There are 4 kids running a race. 3 more join. How many runners now?
A swimmer completes 6 laps and then 1 more. How many laps total?
A child hangs 5 ornaments on a tree and adds 2 more. How many ornaments are there?
There are 6 candy canes in a bowl. A kid eats 1. How many remain?
A snowman has 3 buttons. Someone adds 3 more. How many buttons now?
A basket has 8 Easter eggs. 2 fall out. How many eggs stay inside?
A child lights 2 holiday candles and then lights 4 more. How many candles are lit?
A kid has 4 toy robots and gets 2 more. How many robots now?
There are 3 teddy bears on a shelf. The child adds 3 more. How many now?
A girl has 5 toy trains but loses 1. How many trains left?
A boy builds with 7 blocks and adds 2 more. How many blocks total?
A child has 9 crayons but shares 3. How many crayons remain?
A red car has 4 wheels and a toy truck has 4 wheels. How many wheels in total?
A kid has 6 toy cars and gets 3 more. How many cars now?
There are 8 cars in a race. 2 slow down and leave. How many are still racing?
A garage has 5 cars. One drives away. How many cars remain?
A boy sees 7 blue cars and 1 red car. How many cars does he see?
Pikachu finds 3 berries. Ash gives him 3 more. How many berries now?
Charmander sees 4 small rocks and 2 big ones. How many rocks total?
Squirtle splashes 5 kids but 1 runs away. How many kids stay?
Eevee has 6 friends join her. Then 2 more arrive. How many friends in total?
Bulbasaur has 7 leaves and drops 2. How many leaves remain?
Bluey has 3 toys and Bingo brings 4 more. How many toys are there?
Dad makes 5 pancakes but Bluey eats 1. How many pancakes left?
Bluey and Bingo find 6 butterflies and then spot 2 more. How many butterflies?
Bluey has 8 crayons and gives 2 to Bingo. How many remain?
Bingo has 4 blocks and Bluey adds 4 more. How many blocks now?
Numberblock One meets Numberblock Two. How many blocks total?
Numberblock Four splits off 1 block. How many blocks remain?
Numberblock Five finds 3 stars. How many stars does she have?
Numberblock Three gets 3 balloons. How many balloons total?
Numberblock Six rolls 4 dice and then 2 more. How many dice total?
A bunny picks 2 carrots and later picks 5 more. How many carrots?
A farm has 5 cows and 3 horses. How many animals total?
A duck swims with 6 ducklings. 1 goes the other way. How many stay?
A frog jumps onto 7 lily pads but skips 2. How many does it land on?
A cat sees 9 leaves falling but stops counting after 3 fall. How many still falling?
A rocket has 2 astronauts inside and 5 more board. How many astronauts total?
A space alien sees 3 glowing rocks and then 3 more. How many rocks?
A space shuttle carries 4 boxes and adds 2 more. How many boxes total?
A moon base has 7 robots. 1 goes offline. How many stay online?
A starship launches 9 probes and 1 returns. How many probes remain launched?
A child kicks 3 soccer balls and then kicks 3 more. How many kicks total?
A tennis player has 8 balls but loses 2. How many left?
There are 2 cones on the field. The coach adds 4 more. How many cones now?
A runner takes 7 steps and then 1 more. How many steps in total?
A hockey team has 6 sticks but breaks 1. How many sticks remain?
A pumpkin patch has 5 pumpkins. Kids bring 4 more. How many pumpkins now?
A child decorates 6 cookies and eats 1. How many cookies decorated?
There are 3 presents under a tree and 2 more are added. How many presents?
A snowflake falls on 4 kids' gloves and then on 3 more. How many gloves get snow?
A child finds 8 candy wrappers and throws away 3. How many left to pick up?
A toy box has 7 cars and 2 trucks. How many vehicles total?
A kid lines up 5 toy dinosaurs and adds 3 more. How many dinosaurs?
A child builds with 6 LEGO bricks and attaches 2 more. How many bricks total?
A puzzle has 9 pieces but 1 is missing. How many pieces are left?
A kid has 3 balloons and gets 4 more. How many balloons now?
A child has 3 apples and gets 2 more. How many apples total?
A basket has 6 bananas and 1 falls out. How many bananas remain?
A kid buys 4 cupcakes and then buys 3 more. How many cupcakes now?
A plate has 8 cookies. A child eats 2. How many cookies left?
A bowl has 5 strawberries and 5 blueberries. How many fruits total?
A family lights 3 festival lanterns and then lights 4 more. How many lanterns total?
A holiday parade has 6 floats. 2 more join. How many floats now?
A child decorates 5 pumpkins, then decorates 2 more. How many pumpkins decorated?
There are 4 fireworks in the sky and 3 more launch. How many fireworks total?
A kid collects 7 holiday stickers and gets 1 more. How many stickers total?
A drawer has 5 spoons and 5 forks. How many utensils total?
A kitchen has 6 bowls. A child sets 2 on the table. How many are left in the kitchen?
A cook uses 3 plates and then takes 2 more. How many plates does the cook have?
A table has 7 cups. 1 cup falls. How many cups remain on the table?
A kitchen counter has 4 pans and someone adds 3 more. How many pans now?
A child has 3 books and gets 4 more. How many books now?
A classroom shelf has 6 books. A teacher adds 2 more. How many books total?
A kid reads 2 books in the morning and 3 at night. How many books read?
A library has 9 storybooks. 1 is borrowed. How many remain?
A child finds 5 comics and then finds 2 more. How many comics total?
A pencil box has 5 pencils. A child adds 3 more. How many pencils now?
A child has 7 pencils but loses 2. How many pencils remain?
A pack has 6 pencils and 1 pen. How many writing tools total?
A student finds 4 colored pencils and then finds 3 more. How many now?
A kid sharpens 5 pencils but 1 breaks. How many sharpened pencils remain?
A kid has 3 pens and buys 2 more. How many pens now?
A desk has 4 blue pens and someone adds 4 black pens. How many pens total?
A student loses 1 of their 7 pens. How many remain?
A child finds 6 pens and gives 1 to a friend. How many remain?
A kid has 5 gel pens and gets 3 more. How many gel pens now?
There are 5 doughnuts and 3 more are added. How many doughnuts total?
A kid has 4 sandwiches and eats 1. How many sandwiches left?
A bowl has 7 grapes. A child eats 2. How many grapes remain?
A tray has 6 slices of pizza. Kids add 2 more. How many slices now?
A smoothie cup has 5 strawberries and 4 bananas. How many fruits inside?
A Holi celebration has 5 color packets, and 4 more are brought. How many packets total?
A Christmas tree has 7 ornaments. Kids add 2 more. How many ornaments now?
A festival stand displays 6 flags, then adds 3 more. How many flags now?
A child receives 4 gifts and then 3 more. How many gifts total?
A pumpkin patch has 8 pumpkins; 1 rolls away. How many left?
A pantry has 4 bowls and someone puts 3 more inside. How many bowls total?
There are 6 forks on a table; 2 roll off. How many forks remain?
A pot holds 7 spoons but 1 is taken out. How many spoons inside now?
A drawer has 3 knives and 5 forks. How many utensils total?
A cookbook has 9 recipes. A new page adds 1 more. How many recipes now?
A kid has 3 notebooks, gets 2 more. How many notebooks now?
A classroom has 6 folders. A teacher puts in 3 more. How many folders?
A student has 4 erasers and finds 2 more. How many erasers now?
A kid brings 7 markers to school but loses 1. How many remain?
A desk has 5 rulers. A student adds 3 more. How many rulers now?
Liam went to the park with 2 apples in his pocket. His mom gave him 3 more. How many apples did Liam have now?
Emma brought 4 crayons to class. Her friend shared 2 more with her. How many crayons does Emma have?
Noah baked 3 cookies in the morning and 2 more in the afternoon. How many cookies did he bake today?
Ava picked 5 flowers on her walk. A butterfly landed on 1 and flew away with it. How many flowers does she still have?
Mia stacked 2 books on her shelf and then found 4 more under her bed. How many books did she place on her shelf?
Ethan packed 3 snacks for school. His dad added 1 more snack to his bag. How many snacks did Ethan bring?
Sophia drew 4 stars on her paper, then drew 3 more. How many stars did she draw?
Oliver had 6 balloons, but 2 floated away. How many balloons does he still have?
Isabella placed 3 stickers on her notebook and later added 2 more. How many stickers are on her notebook now?
Lucas collected 7 colorful rocks at the beach. He gave 2 to his friend. How many rocks does Lucas have now?
Amelia packed 2 toy cars for her trip. Her brother handed her 2 more. How many cars did she bring?
Harper had 5 crayons in her box. She dropped 1 under her chair. How many crayons are still in the box?
Henry poured 3 cups of juice and then poured 1 more. How many cups did he pour?
Evelyn found 6 seashells at the beach. A wave washed 2 away. How many seashells are left?
Jackson had 4 toy dinosaurs. He found 3 more in his toy box. How many dinosaurs does he have now?
Ella baked 2 muffins and her sister baked 5. How many muffins did they bake together?
Aiden picked 6 blueberries, but he ate 1. How many blueberries remain?
Scarlett carried 3 pencils to school and borrowed 2 from her friend. How many pencils does she have now?
Grayson planted 4 seeds in the garden and later planted 2 more. How many seeds did he plant?
Aria found 5 shiny marbles, but one rolled away. How many marbles does she still have?
Leo built a block tower using 3 red blocks and 3 blue blocks. How many blocks did he use?
Chloe put 4 cookies on her plate and added 3 more. How many cookies are on her plate?
Mateo counted 7 ants marching on the sidewalk. Then 2 ran off. How many ants does he see now?
Luna brought 2 markers to art class and found 4 more in her desk. How many markers does she have?
Wyatt saw 5 birds in a tree. Two flew away. How many birds are still in the tree?
Mila collected 3 feathers and her friend gave her 3 more. How many feathers does she have?
James had 4 crayons in his hand, then picked up 4 more. How many crayons does he have total?
Aubrey ate 2 strawberries from a bowl that had 7. How many are left?
Benjamin had 6 stickers and used 3 on his notebook. How many are left in his hand?
Eleanor made 4 paper hearts and later made 2 more. How many hearts did she make?
Logan found 3 toy robots in his closet and spotted 2 more under his bed. How many robots?
Abigail drew 5 flowers and erased 1. How many flowers are still in her picture?
Jacob had 2 juice boxes and his friend gave him 2 more. How many juice boxes now?
Emily picked 6 colorful leaves in the fall. One blew away. How many leaves does she still have?
Michael read 3 pages of his book and then 2 more pages. How many pages did he read?
Sofia packed 4 crayons in her bag. Her teacher gave her 2 more. How many crayons does she have?
Daniel saw 5 fish in the pond and then saw 3 more swim up. How many fish does he see?
Avery had 7 gummy bears, but her brother ate 2. How many gummy bears left?
Sebastian folded 3 paper airplanes and made 4 more. How many airplanes total?
Nora picked 4 sunflowers in the garden and later picked 3 more. How many sunflowers total?
David carried 2 oranges from the kitchen. His sister handed him 1 more. How many oranges now?
Scarlett collected 5 shiny beads and found 2 more under her pillow. How many beads total?
Joseph built a tower with 4 blocks and added 3 more. How many blocks tall is it?
Victoria cut out 6 stars from paper. One fell on the floor. How many are still on her desk?
Theo picked 3 cherries from the tree and then picked 4 more. How many cherries total?
Natalie found 2 puzzle pieces, then her brother found 5 more. How many puzzle pieces now?
Dylan had 5 crayons but lost 2. How many crayons remain?
Hazel placed 4 cookies on a tray and then added 4 more. How many cookies now?
Eli saw 7 bees buzzing around a flower. Two flew away. How many bees does he still see?
Aurora drew 6 hearts on the page. She erased 2. How many hearts remain?
Hudson found 2 shiny rocks and then 3 more near the stream. How many rocks total?
Violet packed 5 crayons and lost 1 on the way. How many crayons does she still have?
Hunter had 3 cupcakes, then baked 4 more. How many cupcakes total?
Penelope picked 6 apples from a tree. One dropped. How many apples remain?
Levi found 4 shells in the sand and then found 4 more by the water. How many shells now?
Claire carried 5 stickers to school and her friend gave her 2 more. How many stickers total?
Owen had 7 crayons and lost 1 at recess. How many crayons remain?
Stella caught 3 fireflies, then caught 2 more. How many fireflies does she have?
Luke placed 2 cups on the table, then added 4 more. How many cups are on the table?
Zoe made 4 bracelets and then made 2 more. How many bracelets total?
Isaac planted 3 seeds in a pot and added 3 more. How many seeds total?
Hannah picked 2 daisies and her mom handed her 4 more. How many daisies does she have?
Anthony had 6 toy cars and gave 1 to his friend. How many cars remain?
Lillian saw 5 ladybugs on a leaf and then spotted 2 more. How many ladybugs total?
Jack read 2 chapters this morning and 3 more tonight. How many chapters did he read?
Addison colored 3 stars and later colored 4 more. How many stars did she color?
Wyatt stacked 2 toy blocks and added 5 more. How many blocks in his stack?
Samantha held 4 balloons and then got 2 more from her dad. How many balloons now?
Gabriel picked 6 carrots from the garden. His rabbit ate 1. How many remain?
Ariana found 3 cute buttons in her craft box and later found 3 more. How many buttons now?
Nicholas saw 4 clouds shaped like animals and 3 more drifted by. How many clouds total?
Maya put 5 cherries in her bowl and added 2 more. How many cherries now?
Josiah counted 6 ants on a stick. Two crawled away. How many ants does he see now?
Hailey poured 3 cups of lemonade and then poured 3 more. How many cups total?
Caleb found 4 stickers on his desk and then found 4 more in his backpack. How many stickers total?
Paisley brought 3 cookies to school and her friend gave her 3 more. How many cookies?
Eliana planted 5 small plants and added 2 more. How many plants now?
Ezra made 6 drawings but gave 1 to his teacher. How many drawings remain?
Naomi has 3 pencils and finds 4 more in her drawer. How many pencils now?
Thomas folded 4 paper planes and made 1 more. How many did he make in total?
Ruby found 2 dogs in the park and then saw 3 more running by. How many dogs did she see?
Asher counted 7 fireflies in the backyard. Two flew away. How many remain?
Bella had 6 crayons and dropped 1. How many crayons remain?
Xavier washed 4 dishes and then washed 3 more. How many dishes did he wash?
Leah drew 5 stars and erased 1. How many stars remain?
Evan picked 2 oranges and later picked 4 more. How many oranges now?
Elise found 6 beads and gave 2 to her sister. How many beads remain?
Connor lined up 3 toy trains and added 2 more. How many toy trains total?
Sadie had 7 crayons and used 2 for her picture. How many crayons does she have left?
Isaiah scooped 4 snowballs and then scooped 1 more. How many snowballs total?
Caroline picked 3 apples and her brother picked 4 apples. How many apples total?
Adam found 5 toy blocks under the couch and 2 behind the shelf. How many blocks?
Aaliyah ate 2 pieces of candy from her bag of 6. How many pieces remain?
Christian found 3 markers on his desk and later found 3 more in his backpack. How many markers total?
Autumn collected 5 pinecones and her friend gave her 1 more. How many pinecones total?
Ezekiel counted 4 frogs at the pond and then spotted 2 more. How many frogs total?
Alice had 7 beads and used 2 to make a bracelet. How many beads left?
Ian read 3 chapters before bed and 3 more in the morning. How many chapters did he read?
Ariella picked 4 strawberries and her sister picked 4 more. How many strawberries total?
Roman found 2 toy cars under his bed and then found 5 more. How many toy cars now?
Liam had 2 apples. He bought 3 more and then gave 1 to his friend. How many apples does he have now?
Emma found 4 shells on the beach. She found 2 more, but 1 blew away. How many shells does she keep?
Noah read 3 pages in the morning and 2 more at night, then reread 1 page. How many pages did he read altogether?
Ava planted 5 seeds, then planted 2 more. One didnâ€™t grow. How many grew?
Mia drew 3 stars, added 3 more, then erased 2. How many stars remain?
Ethan packed 2 snacks, then added 2 more, but ate 1. How many snacks are left?
Sophia had 6 balloons. She gave 2 away and then got 1 more. How many balloons now?
Oliver built a tower with 4 blocks and added 3 more. Then 2 fell off. How many remain?
Isabella collected 5 stickers, got 2 more, and used 1 on her notebook. How many stickers does she have?
Lucas had 7 marbles, lost 2, then found 3 more. How many marbles now?
Amelia put 2 cookies on her plate. Her mom added 4 more, and she ate 1. How many are left?
Harper filled her jar with 3 pomâ€‘poms, then added 3 more. She gave 2 to her friend. How many remain?
Henry drew 4 circles and 2 squares, then erased 1 circle. How many shapes remain?
Evelyn picked 6 blueberries, ate 2, then picked 3 more. How many blueberries now?
Jackson had 5 toy cars, got 2 new ones, then lost 1. How many cars does he have?
Ella had 3 markers, found 3 more, then gave 1 away. How many markers remain?
Aiden made 4 paper airplanes and 2 more later. One ripped. How many good airplanes remain?
Scarlett counted 6 bees, 2 flew away, then 3 more arrived. How many bees does she see?
Grayson collected 3 stones, found 4 more, then dropped 1. How many stones does he have?
Aria picked 5 flowers and then 2 more. One wilted. How many good flowers remain?
Leo wrote 2 sentences, wrote 3 more, then erased 1. How many sentences did he keep?
Chloe bought 4 crayons and got 2 as a gift. Then she lost 1. How many crayons remain?
Mateo saw 5 ladybugs, then saw 2 more, and 1 flew away. How many ladybugs now?
Luna carried 3 pencils and put 2 more in her bag. She gave 1 to her friend. How many remain?
Wyatt had 6 toy ships, lost 3, found 2 more. How many ships now?
Mila made 4 bracelets, made 2 more, then gave 1 away. How many bracelets does she have?
James bought 3 muffins, ate 1, then bought 2 more. How many muffins does he have?
Aubrey picked 7 leaves, dropped 2, and picked 1 more. How many leaves now?
Benjamin had 4 trucks, bought 4 more, then gave 1 to his brother. How many trucks left?
Eleanor found 5 shells and 3 more later. One cracked. How many shells remain?
Nicholas had 3 books, got 4 more, then returned 1. How many books now?
Maya carried 2 notebooks, picked up 3 more, then gave 1 away. How many notebooks now?
Josiah saw 4 frogs and then 3 more hopped over, but 1 hopped away. How many frogs now?
Hailey collected 6 pinecones, dropped 2, then found 1 more. How many pinecones now?
Caleb made 3 paper boats, made 2 more, and 1 ripped. How many boats remain?
